This recall involves any custom made sub sandwich with onions sold from the Publix Deli department between July 7,

product_description: Fruit Mango Peeled and Sliced, Ready To Eat Product, 2, 5-lb Trays per case
reason_for_recall: Coast Citrus Distributors, Inc. and its divisions Coast Tropical and Olympic Fruit & Vegetables are conducting a voluntary product recall of Kent's brand & Keitt's brand mangoes packed at Agricola Daniella due to salmonella associated with mangoes from this producer.
